import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create environment variable"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/acts/{actorId}/versions/{versionNumber}/env-vars"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



<span class="openapi-clients-box"><span class="openapi-clients-box-heading">Clients</span><a href="https://docs.apify.com/api/client/python/reference/class/ActorEnvVarCollectionClientAsync#create" target="_blank"><img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apify/openapi/b1206ac2adf8f39b05e5a09bf32c2802af58d851/assets/python.svg" class="openapi-clients-box-icon" alt="Apify API Python Client Reference"/></a></span><span id="/reference/actors/environment-variable-collection/create-environment-variable"></span><span id="/reference/actors/create-environment-variable"></span>Creates an environment variable of an Actor using values specified in a
[EnvVar object](#/reference/actors/environment-variable-object) passed as
JSON in the POST payload.

The request must specify `name` and `value` parameters (as strings) in the
JSON payload and a `Content-Type: application/json` HTTP header.

```

{
    "name": "ENV_VAR_NAME",
    "value": "my-env-var"
}

```

The response is the [EnvVar
object](#/reference/actors/environment-variable-object) as returned by the [Get environment
variable](#/reference/actors/environment-variable-object/get-environment-variable)
endpoint.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"actorId","in":"path","description":"Actor ID or a tilde-separated owner's username and Actor name.","required":true,"style":"simple","schema":{"type":"string","example":"janedoe~my-actor"}},{"name":"versionNumber","in":"path","description":"Actor version","required":true,"style":"simple","schema":{"type":"string","example":"0.1"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"CreateOrUpdateEnvVarRequest","required":["name","value"],"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"MY_ENV_VAR"},"value":{"type":"string","example":"my-new-value"},"isSecret":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"example":false}}},"example":{"name":"ENV_VAR_NAME","value":"my-env-var"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"","headers":{"Location":{"content":{"text/plain":{"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"https://api.apify.com/v2/acts/zdc3Pyhyz3m8vjDeM/versions/1.0/env-vars/ENV_VAR_NAME"}}}},"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"CreateEnvironmentVariableResponse","required":["data"],"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"title":"EnvVar","required":["name","value"],"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","example":"MY_ENV_VAR"},"value":{"type":"string","example":"my-value"},"isSecret":{"type":"boolean","nullable":true,"example":false}}}}},"example":{"data":{"name":"MY_ENV_VAR","value":"my-value","isSecret":false}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
